column2: The images on the homepage do not match the products when the certain user logs in.

When the user logs in, they are redirected to the homepage, which displays products for purchase. All products on the homepage have the same image, which does not correspond to the product name. Each product should have an image that matches its name. This is a visual bug.

column1: 3. Input valid username in "Username" field e.g. problem_user
4. Input valid password in "Password" field e.g. secret_sauce

column2:
User is successfully login and redirected to "products" page (https://www.saucedemo.com/v1/inventory.html)
Products are visible with their picture, name and price.
column3: Pictures for all products are same and does not correspond to the product name.
